txt.en: You should defeat enemies within Gemyndsted and spare the ruins further damage.

The ruins of Gemyndsted show signs that the invaders have little respect for the relics and texts stored within. The invaders have ruined priceless artifacts, toppled book-shelves, and have damaged ancient texts. Whatever remains must be preserved.
You should defeat enemies within Gemyndsted and spare the ruins further damage.
You should speak with Egbalth and inform him of your efforts in preventing further damage to Gemyndsted relics.

The ruins of Gemyndsted show signs that the invaders have little respect for the relics and texts stored within. The invaders have ruined priceless artifacts, toppled book-shelves and have damaged ancient texts. Whatever remains must be preserved.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Gemyndsted: Leader of Vandals to be underway in order to access Gemyndsted. If that quest has been completed, or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Gemyndsted in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

'It disturbs me deeply to see such priceless historical texts ruined needlessly. Your work to defeat the invaders and preserve these priceless texts is most appreciated. You have my thanks, [placeholder]'
Gemyndsted: Vandals of the Lost Lore
